name: stoneservice
0:
”Alexa, open stone service”
”Alexa, ask stone service to receive a call”
”Alexa, ask stone service to hang up a call”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: stone service
des:
The stone service skill is the easiest hands-free way to allow users to use the phone services (call, receive, hang up) by using MOIM-Alexa & phone apps in 'AI phone' which is VoIP product from Moimstone.

How it works: (sample utterances)
1. make a call 
"Alexa, open stone service and call (someone)" or 
"Alexa, ask stone service to dial (digit numbers)" or 
- (someone) who is in phone-book list of 'AI phone'(Model name) which is VoIP phone from Moimstone.

2. accept a call: if 'Ai phone' is ringing, 
"Alexa, open stone service and receive a call" or 
"Alexa, ask stone service to pick up"

3. hang up a call
"Alexa, open stone service and hang up a call" or 
"Alexa, ask stone service to hang up"


** The hardware requirement is 'Ai phone'(product name) which is VoIP phone product from Moimstone.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
